APPEARANCE.name: IV Gou Sensha D-gata Kai (F2-gata Shiyou)
IV Gou Sensha D-gata Kai (H-gata Shiyou)

description:
In this world, Senshadou — the military art of using tanks — is every bit as important to a http://anidb.net/t2597 [yamato nadeshiko] as flower arrangement and the tea ceremony.
http://anidb.net/ch44859 [Nishizumi Miho] is a new transfer student wanting nothing to do with Sensha-do. However, she is summoned before the student council president who forcibly enrols her in Sensha-do, with the ultimate goal of being part of the school`s team in the National Sensha-do Tournament. To make matters worse, every single member of the team is eccentric.
~ translated and adapted from official site by Cranston
Note: The last episode premiered at a special event on 23.03.2013 in a 1-12 episode marathon run.

REGULAR.description:
Miho wanted to attend a school that didn’t offer Tankery and she thought she did. But when the student council gives her an offer she can’t refuse, her past comes to haunt her.
Source: crunchyroll

With 5 tanks found, the Tankery class split into teams and stage their first mock battle.
Source: crunchyroll

The teams are set, the roles finalized, and… the first match already decided?!  Saint Gloriana Women`s Academy versus Ooarai Girls Academy.
Source: crunchyroll

Tank malfunctions, deserters, and trigger happy gunners.  Miho will have her hands full if 
Oarai Academy is to survive their first match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zrobię, co w mojej mocy jako dowódca!
隊長, がんばります!

REGULAR.description:
The tournament has started and already the real battle starts before the tanks even hit the battlefield.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Veterans of Their Trade: Sherman Corps!
強豪・シャーマン軍団です!

REGULAR.description: Using Saint Gloriana`s trick against them Ooarai has reversed the flow of the battle. Can Nishizumi lead her team to victory?

titles.title: Our First Battle Comes to a Climax!
一回戦, 白熱してます!

REGULAR.description:
Ooarai is doing well but the need to for additional tanks leads the group to searching the entire ship for new firepower.
Source: crunchyroll

Ooarai has gotten cocky with their recent victories and the upcoming match against Pravda will bring them back to earth.
Source: crunchyroll

The news of the school closure has hit the morale of the team hard.  The offer of surrender is beginning to look more tempting as the hours creep on, but Nishizumi has other plans.
Source: crunchyroll

The final battle is coming up and students are approaching Nishizumi in hopes of joining Tankery.  The Tankery club is on the lookout for new tanks.
Source: crunchyroll

Kuromorimine vs. Ooarai, sister vs. sister, can Miho tactics compete against the Nishizumi-style.
Source: crunchyroll

Having lost a few tanks and being overwhelmed by a Maus tank.  Ooarai chance of winning is looking worse each second.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ato ni wa Hikenai Tatakai Desu!
The Battle We Can`t Back Down From!
あとには退けない戦いです!

SPECIAL.description:
We introduce the girls of Girls und Panzer!
Source: crunchyroll

We introduce even more girls of Girls und Panzer!
Source: crunchyroll

In the midst of summer, the student council announces to the school that they`re going to the beach. Meanwhile, the girls go shopping for their swimsuits.
Source: HIDIVE

The school decides to go on a camping trip. Meanwhile, they try to start a barbecue but the freshmen end up making a mess.
Source: HIDIVE

The girls start to learn more about the academy ships and learn the different maintenance areas. Afterwards, the girls go to a hot spring.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: スクールシップ・ウォー!

SPECIAL.description:
The girls go to certain areas around their hometown and perform the Anglerfish dance, a homage to episode 4.
Source: HIDIVE

Taking place in the battle against Pravda, Yukari and Erwin are caught in a snowstorm. Afterwards, they disguise themselves as Pravda students to obtain key information.
Source: HIDIVE

After obtaining their championship victory, the girls go to a celebratory banquet. Meanwhile, an impromptu talent contest breaks out between the teams.
Source: HIDIVE
